page.title: 11Breakfast in Elton
page.content: First a bowl of sugarpuffs with milk poured on top.A mug of instant coffee with boiled milk.I put two slices of bread in the electric toaster,two minutes later it pops out crispy and hot,then I butter it.Every other day our milkman leaves four pint bottles on our doorstep.My Mum bought all the food in the Rainbow Co-op in Orton.Dad and I go with mum in the car. When there is plenty of time we enjoy a big cooked breakfast.My favourite is eggy-bread and bacon.Mum dips slices of bread in beaten egg and fries them in oil in the frying-pan on the electric cooker.Slices of bacon are grilled and put on the top and we usually add tomato sauce for a spicy taste. My Dad likes a plateful of bacon fried eggs, sausages and cooked tomatoes.
